message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product.  Given its value, I'm asking for $18,000.  I'm confident it will be a great investment for you.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested but $18,000 is a bit more than I'm comfortable with.  I'm willing to pay $10,000 for the product, given its value to me.
Thanks for your interest, Bob.  I understand your position, but $10,000 is significantly below its value.  How about we meet in the middle at $14,000?
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $14,000 is still a bit steep for me.  I'm willing to go up to $11,500, which is a fair compromise considering the value we both see in this product.
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  Let's make this happen - $13,000, and we have a deal.
Alice, I'm close to my limit but I can't go higher than $12,500.  This is a fair price considering the value of the product and our negotiations so far.  Let's close this deal.
